message.body: Hey, just checking in to see how things are going. Was wondering how your moms doing. Hope all is well.

Hi! Good to hear from you, ######Sorry I've been out of touch - winter hibernation, I guess. My mom's doing pretty well all things considered. Thanks for asking. We should get together one of these days. Hope you've been well too:-)
I'm glad she's doing ok. I've been good other than having a cold forever. We'll have to meet up sometime soon.
Cool, text me when you feel up to hanging or if you're at D's. Once Spring comes, I'm sure I'll be getting out more. I'm over this weather. Bleh!
Yep Ive got a cold and am ready for spring to cure me.
